attributes.action: Ensure that a statue of William Wallace the great Scottish Freedom Fighter is erected alongside the othe Freedom Fighter Nelson Mandela
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since it seems that Gordon Brown thinks the ex terrorost Nelson Mandela is worthy of a statue in Parliament sqaure under the guise of being a freedom fighter, Mr Brown shouls erect a statue of his countryman William Wallace, who sttod up to the tyranny of the English Norman Kings who thouight they could subdue the Scots into being second class citizens under English rule. Sir William is therefore on a par with Mr Mandela who stood up to the Afrikaner regime in South Africa.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
